channel.title: Server Status IP Address
channel.description:
I'm sorry if this is the wrong board to ask this question.
I recently changed my host for my server, and I can't seem to find a way to edit the server IP address of my current server status. I don't want to make a new one because I've already accumulated a lot of votes. Does anyone know if there's a way of doing this?

item.title: Server Status IP Address
item.dc:creator: @DedicationX DedicationX
item.description:
@DedicationX wrote:

[quote=“chazion, post:3, topic:535744”]I cant quite remember if you could change the actual ip address in the status page but if you had an ip mask you would be able to change that adress.

like if it pointed to myserver.no-ip.biz, you could then change the ip that is pointed to[/quote]

I have the actual IP Address posted, not an IP mask.

Read full topic

item.title: Server Status IP Address
item.dc:creator: @lord0ftacos lord0ftacos
item.description:
@lord0ftacos wrote:

THOMAS14:

Can i ask you a wrong in place question bro? How can i put my server online? If it’s complicated can you give me your skype name? Thanks man and sorry for not responding your question. I’m just asking you because you’ve already got a server online. Thanks.

If you don’t know how to get a server online than your probably going to fail as a server owner. You obviously cannot code in Java so you cannot add any features and it’ll just be a complete leech. Message me though and I’ll help you

Read full topic

item.title: Server Status IP Address
item.dc:creator: @chazion chazion
item.description:
@chazion wrote:

I cant quite remember if you could change the actual ip address in the status page but if you had an ip mask you would be able to change that adress.

like if it pointed to myserver.no-ip.biz, you could then change the ip that is pointed to

Read full topic
